#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
int main(void)
{
	char str[10];
	long int n, q, m, k, i, j;
	long int a[140000];
	scanf ("%ld", &n);
	scanf ("%ld", &q);
	for (q; q > 0; --q)
	{
		scanf ("%s", str);
		if (str[0] == 'A')
		{
			scanf ("%ld", &k);
			printf ("%ld\n", a[k]);
		}
		else
		{
			i = 0;
			scanf ("%ld%ld", &k, &m);
			j = 1;
			for (; i <= n;)
			{
				i = j * k;
				a[i] = a[i] + m;
				++j;
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
